languages.text:
Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, cover efficiency is decreased by −40% for that attack.
<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
Всякий раз, когда владелец атакует врага за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} дистанционной атакой, эффективность укрытия против этой атаки снижается на −40%.
<indent=5%>−15 к {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдаче{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wielder attacks an enemy behind the cover with their ranged attack, this attack suffers a −40% penalty to hit chance to hit the cover, and gains an increased chance to hit the enemy.
<indent=5%>−15 recoil</indent>

languages.text:
着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}の後ろにいる敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃で攻撃するたびに、その攻撃のカバー効率が−40％減少する。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が−15減少 </indent>

languages.text:
当装备者使用远程攻击，攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面的敌人时，敌人的掩体效果降低40%。
<indent=5%>−15{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}。</indent>

<indent=5%>−15{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
Cuando el portador ataca a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} con un ataque a distancia, la eficacia de cobertura se reduce un −40 % para ese ataque.
<indent=5%>−15 de {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g}</indent>

<indent=5%>−15 de retroceso</indent>

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger einen Feind in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} attackiert, wird die Deckungseffizienz für diesen Angriff um −40 % verringert.
<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, cover efficiency is decreased by −40% for that attack.
<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen Feind in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriff angreift, wird die Deckungseffizienz für diesen Angriff um -40 % verringert.
<indent=5%>-15 Rückstoß</indent>

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur lance une attaque à distance contre un ennemi qui est {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}, l'efficacité de la couverture est réduite de −40 % le temps de cette attaque.
<indent=5%>−15 de {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:

<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g}</indent>

<indent=5%>-15 de recul</indent>

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} arkasındaki bir düşmana menzilli saldırı ile saldırdığında o saldırının siper etkililiği %40 azalır.
<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}geri tepme{/g}</indent>
